actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to compensate employees for losses sustained in the value of personal housing due to closing the headquarters of the Sitgreaves National Forest in Holbrook, Ariz.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to compensate Forest Service employees for losses sustained in the value of personal housing due to closing the headquarters of the Sitgreaves National Forest in Holbrook, Arizona. Defines employees eligible for such compensation. Sets forth the method by which compensation for such losses is to be computed. States that appropriations available to the Forest Service shall be available for carrying out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to compensate employees for losses sustained in the value of personal housing due to closing the headquarters of the Sitgreaves National Forest in Holbrook, Ariz.
